snippet: Many companies are choosing to renew existing policies so they can put off assessing the new Affordable Care Act-compliant policies.
abstract: Many companies are choosing to renew existing policies so they can put off assessing the new Affordable Care Act-compliant policies.

headline.main: Obama Health Care Fixes Give Small Businesses Time to Assess
